text: Sir Francis Gerard Brennan (22 May 1928 â€“ 1 June 2022) was an Australian lawyer and jurist. He was the 10th Chief Justice of Australia, appointed by Prime Minister Paul Keating in 1995. Prime Minister Malcolm Fraser appointed Brennan to the court in 1981. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chief justices of Australia Category:Australian lawyers Category:Politicians from Queensland
title: Gerard Brennan
